Project.Brief history of your project and organi: The Henan Online Course Center aims to promote the transformation of educational and teaching concepts in higher education institutions, guide reforms in teaching content and models, and facilitate a shift from teacher-centered instruction to student-centered learning, from classroom-based teaching to a combination of classroom and extracurricular instruction, and from outcome-based evaluation to a combination of outcome and process evaluation. It encourages deepening the reform and innovation of talent cultivation models. The center promotes universities to leverage their disciplinary strengths and modern educational technologies to build high-quality online open courses that are suitable for internet dissemination and instructional activities, with a focus on cultural quality education courses for college students, widely-enrolled general education courses, and core professional courses, ensuring excellent content quality and teaching effectiveness.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
As a data preparer, the process of preparing data for Filecoin involves the following steps:

Data Selection and Aggregation: Data is organized based on client requirements or available datasets, ensuring it meets storage standards and compliance criteria.
Data Packaging: Tools like lotus client deal or venus are used to package the data into a CAR (Content Addressable Archive) file format suitable for the Filecoin network.
Generating Unique Identifiers: IPFS or Filecoin tools are used to generate a CID (Content ID) for the data, which uniquely identifies and verifies the content.
Initiating Storage Deals: A storage deal is created on the Filecoin blockchain, where appropriate miners are selected and storage duration and price parameters are set.
Data Sealing and Verification: Miners "seal" the data onto their storage devices and use zero-knowledge proofs (zk-SNARKs) to verify the integrity of the stored data.
On-chain Confirmation and Monitoring: Once the deal is recorded on the blockchain, it can be monitored via a block explorer to ensure the storage remains active and valid.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, Europe, Australia (continent)
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
